entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:48 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing early this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle after midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
